title: Simple Pendulum Period Investigation
description: An interactive simulation for investigating the relationship between pendulum length and period. Students can measure swing periods, collect data at various lengths, and verify the theoretical equation T = 2π√(L/g) through systematic experimentation.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: simple pendulum
period
oscillation
simple harmonic motion
physics
mechanics
gravity
laboratory investigation

objectives: Explain the relationship between pendulum length and period
Predict how changing length affects period
Analyze data by comparing measured to theoretical values
